|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS1105;CAVIUM NETWORKS, Star(TM), CNS1105-200BG304-AD00-G, 217HLNJ5.1am, D0927-G, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMFA526 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- 200 / 250 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640EBTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ESMT;M13S2561616A-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== From a sample production unit.. *"WL-WEJ02-03", "2008-01-18", and a date code of ''0933'' is silkscreened on the main board. *"WL-POE02-02", "2008-12-17", and a date code of ''0933'' is silkscreened on the power board.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
